None.Name: Forest's Charm
None.Description: Activate to release the regenerative powers of the forest and surround the unit by a magical aura of 25m that heals friendly units within it. Every 2 seconds, up to 10 friendly units restore 88 life points each, up to 880 in total. Lasts for 20 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Pest Plants
None.Description: Unit is surrounded by pestering weeds that poison enemy units within a 20m radius. They will lose 50 life points every second while being near Forest Elder.
